purchase_reason: The primary reason for purchasing this product was based on a long-standing trust in the brand, as it had been a go-to choice for my husband for decades. However, the recent decline in quality, particularly after just a few washes, led to disappointment. The expectation of durability and comfort was not met, which ultimately resulted in a search for alternatives.

The decision to buy this item stemmed from an initial attraction to the style and brand, coupled with the desire for quality and durability. Unfortunately, the experience of the product ripping shortly after purchase highlighted a lack of reliability, leading to frustration and the need to consider other brands.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that are comfortable, durable, and maintain their quality over time. I value items that fit well and provide a good balance of style and functionality, especially in clothing. I appreciate when products are made from quality materials that hold up to regular use and washing without developing issues like holes or fading. Additionally, I tend to favor items that are easy to care for and do not require extensive maintenance. On the other hand, I dislike products that are poorly constructed or lack durability, as well as those that do not offer good value for the price. I am particularly sensitive to issues of quality, especially when it comes to clothing that should last through multiple washes and wears.

Item No.1 : Item Title: <Wrangler Riggs Workwear Men's Utility Jean> / Item ID: B084M5373Q / Price: $49.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Uniforms Work & Safety', 'Clothing', 'Work Utility & Safety'] / Description: ['WRANGLER RIGGS WORKWEAR: Whatever the job, it’s time to step up. There’s nothing like an honest day’s work done in the right work clothes. Whether you’re a professional electrician, a hobbyist woodworker or construction worker, you’ll find our RIGGS WORKWEAR for men is designed with both comfort and utility in mind. We’ve designed clothes with a Room2Move Fit for improved range of motion and have made sure that your clothes are tough enough to withstand anything with features like triple-needle stitching and added reinforcement in high-wear areas. Our Carpenter Jeans, Ripstop Cargo Pants, Ranger Pants and denim come in a variety of colors and a wide selection of men’s long-sleeve shirts, tees, jackets, vests and FR clothing offer versatile, everyday pieces that can be worn mowing the lawn, camping or on the job site. Big and tall sizes deliver a great fit in every size. Made to withstand the toughest work conditions, the most extreme adventures and every casual occasion in between, this collection has your back.'] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Wrangler Authentics Men's Classic Carpenter Jean> / Item ID: B09DTY2JSR / Price: $26.25 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Jeans'] / Description: ["With classic carpenter details, the Wrangler Authentic Men's Classic Carpenter pant is sure to be your favorite, whether if you are working on the job or causally going out for the day. Featuring a soft yet durable cotton polyester blend, this jean offers lasting comfort and functionality throughout your day. Design for work, these jeans feature 2 large front and back pockets, 1 rule pocket and 1 hammer loop, as they provide you with a place for all your tools and belongings."]
